entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Parent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:20 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 this morning then steady.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 11 this morning then steady. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
